body:
On Ubuntu/debian libs were installed on lib/x86_64-linux-gnu leading cmake not to find them when compiling
another package (not pushed yet) based on argon2. They are now installed on lib whatever the plarform.
The modification seems fine for py-argon2-cffi that is based on argon2 on Ubuntu 18 and CentOS 7.
title: argon2: make a standard installation for lib for cmake
